page.title: 10DENNIS MORTIMER, FOOTBALLER.
page.content: I have lived in Wall for five years with my wife Janis, and two children, Richard and Jonathan. We live in a cottage which was once a barn, one part believed to be 200 years old, the other 100. I am a professional footballer, 10 years with Aston Villa Football Club. Now I play for Brighton Football Club, this means I divide my time between the two places. I find Wall an excellent place to escape the crowds and noise of a football match. Being a small community we find the folk very friendly. With both mine and my wife's parents living far afield we find villagers willing to help ferrying children to school in Lichfield and for babysitting duties. Wall does not have any shops so it is essential to have your own means of transport.
